titleStmt.title: The debate and stryfe betwene somer and wynter with the estate present of man.
Debat de liver et de leste. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me laurens andrew These bookes be for to sell [by R. Wyer?] at the signe of seynt Ioh[a]n Euangelyst, in saynt Martyns parysshe besyde Charynge crosse,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Le debat de liver et de leste.
Imprint from colophon; bookseller's name and publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
